mapper.select: SELECT medication_no AS medicationNo ,medicine_no AS medicineNo ,medication_start_date AS medicationStartDate ,medication_end_date AS medicationEndDate ,dosage AS dosage ,total_dosage AS totalDosage ,medication_title AS medicationTitle ,medication_date AS medicationDate FROM medication WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY medication_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT medication.medication_no AS medicationNo ,medication.medicine_no AS medicineNo ,medicine.medicine_name AS medicineName ,medication.member_no AS memberNo ,member.member_name AS memberName ,medication.medication_start_date AS medicationStartDate ,medication.medication_end_date AS medicationEndDate ,medication.dosage AS dosage ,medication.total_dosage AS totalDosage ,medication.medication_title AS medicationTitle ,medication.medication_content AS medicationContent ,medication.medication_date AS medicationDate FROM medication, member, medicine WHERE medication_no = #{medicationNo} and medication.medicine_no = medicine.medicine_no and medication.member_no = member.member_no
